name: chessEloEstimator
title: Chess ELO Estimator
subtitle: LTSM, NN and CNN based models for estimating Chess ELO ratings from the lichess database

items.text: LSTMs are pretty useful for sequence info, i.e. a chess PGN. LSTMs captur dependancies between moves in sequences, We can extract the impact of early game on the midgame to correlate our Elo Estimations, Even if that is a long range dependancy...
